data.text: @nzherald New york, Ireland is dropping all madates tomorrow. Wtf is nz doing? Still trapped in this brainwashing propaganda its seriously disturbing the stupidity

@nzherald Refer Pfizer papers
Just look at the side effects. 🤯🤯🤯
Man-it'll your skin crawl
And every expert knew and even though it's out in the public, they still carry on? Just crazy.
Some huge court cases coming up?
@nzherald 6 million people died that happened to have covid, is more accurate

@mantistrader @MrImagina @nzherald And that’s the point. We’re prepared to accept figures for some viral infections at face value (we do so for a number of conditions). But for some reason Covid doesn’t get the same pass.

@mantistrader @MrImagina @nzherald I have no proof that Pneumonia figures are being inflated.
However it can be reasonably assumed that were we to apply the same scrutiny to pneumonia deaths (ie: did x die from pneumonia, or another underlying condition/age/poor health?), we’d find similar trends in reporting.
